To get started\, long click to rename your 'habits' to something meaningful to you. Tap the habit's button to mark/record an action.

 We recommend TxtPad Lite (no affiliation) as a convenient way to view or edit the ActiveHabits.txt file that contains the recorded data placed on your SD card.

 There are many possible uses for an activity similar to this. The original use was to track 'wake up' and 'go to bed' habits. If you have ideas for slightly changes to this activity for some other purpose please contact us.

This activity was crafted by http://activehabits.com
